message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $9,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is within your range.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my original asking price. I'm willing to go down to $9,250.  This is a fair compromise, and it still allows you to get a good deal. Let me know what you think.

I understand your position, Alice. I've considered your latest offer, but I'm still not able to meet you at $9,250. I would like to propose $9,100 as my maximum offer. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
